explains: n. 滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器

sentences.en: They look at the stock ticker to see where the stock price is.
sentences.cn: 他们查看股票行情收报机以了解股票价格。

sentences.en: AT&T's ticker symbol on the New York Stock Exchange will remain T.
sentences.cn: 美国电话电报公司的股票代码在纽约证券交易所仍将是T。

sentences.en: A half million people watched the troops march in New York's ticker tape parade.
sentences.cn: 有50万人观看了部队在纸带纷飞的纽约列队前进。
